Utterance: Tai Syam kichu moushumi allergy chara sustho ebong onno sobkichu thik ache, tarpor.

Asle, puro-puri na. Ami jani na ki ghotche kintu gat school bochor ebong ei bochorer moddhe, hothat korei ami tar shikshok er kach theke ei phone call pachi je she class-e monoyog dicche na. Tara mone kore tar hothat ADEHDI hoyeche. Mane, ami jani na eta kotha theke asche. Kintu eti amar ek bochor age eki bachcha noy.

Thik ache, tai shonachhe jeno aryo kichuta cholche ebong aro kichu udbeg jao apni bolte chhilen. Tai sambhobotho eta bojhay je, amra koyek minute somoy nei ebong tarpor ami apnar sathe chat kori ebong tarpor ami Syam er sathe koyek minute katabo. Nishchoi. Eta darun hobe. Thik ache, Syam, tumi ki bhitore jete chao, waiting room-e bichanar jonne adda dao ebong ami koyek minute er moddhe tomarke khujte ber korbo. Egiye jao, sona. Tai Syam ebong tar school-e thaka somoshyagulo sambhobotho rokom bole amake bolun.

Thik ache, se sompurno bhinno bachchar moto ebong bhalo upaye noy. Hothat kore, ei bochor, ami tar shikshok, principal-er kach theke saptah tin, char bar call pachi. Tara emon kotha bolche jeno she class-e abhinoy korche. Tini shamanoy dhoroner raganvit spurts hochhe. Hothat kore, she tar homework korchhe na, ja amar kachhe sompurno notun. Tar grade piche jacche. Ami bolte chacchi, tini 70-80-90-er dashake bachchader moto chhilen. Ekhon tar boyosh 60. Tai ei moto mone hoy.

Gat bochor theke ekta bastob bimukh gat bochor theke bastob poriborton. Oh, puro-puri rat ebong diner moto. Thik ache, tai mone hochhe bari te kichu somosya hoyeche. Tai ami apnake kichu screening proshno jiggasha korte jacchi ja ami somosto pitamatarke jiggasha korechi, tader moddhe kichu apnar jonno upokrito hote pare. Ebong tader moddhe kichu sombhobotho proyojon hote pare. Ebong tader moddhe kichu sombhobotho probhab shoyeb hoye notun na hoye puro. Thakbe na, tai amra ekshathe tader moddhe giye jabo. Oboshoyi, eta kora uchit. Tai keno amra shuru korbo na apni kemon ashen?
Um, satyo bolchi, ami pachchi. Mane, ami mone kori apni janen, Daryl ebong ami gat bochor bibahbichchhed hoye chhilam. She B.C.-te kothao ase sudhu Ishwor-e janen.
Tai she ki aadou Syamke dekhche naki?
Ami mone kori tara proti koyek mash-e ekbar Skype kore, kintu she asholei jogajog korenni. Ebong tini shei taka pathachen na je tini protishruti diyechilen. Tai amra ekhoni takiye romanchito noi.
Tai er ortho ki orthosongsthan tight hoyeche naki?

Haan, ami bolte chacchi, ami ashete chai child support-er upor nirbhor korchilam. Apni janen, tinjon lok-er poribarer sathe jinishguli aṭshaṭ ebong tarpor protyek dīrghokāl dhore, Daren chole geche. Amar Mao amar sathe chole geche. Se, apni janen, apnar boyosh barar sathe sathe she ekṭu beshi dimension pête shuru korche. Kichu lok kebol tader baba-ma-ke ekṭi bari te aṭkẏe raḵhe tōbe ami bhalo meyechhilam ebong ami takiye rakhar siddhanto niye chhilam.
Tai onek poriborton, onek kichu cholche. Haan. Ebong kibhabe apni je sob shonge porichalona korchen mato mone hochhe?

Ami bolte chacchi, kichu din spashṭotai onnodero tulonay bhalo ba kharap hoyeche eti onek poriborton hoyeche jemon apni bolechilen, ami bolte chacchi, ami jotoṣṭho ghum pacchi na ami arthikbhabhe khub kharap.
Abeggatbhabe, apni kibhabe seguli korchen ebong jinishguli porichalona korchen.

Apni janen maje maje khub chap hoy, jemon amar mayer kono porb thake ba jokhon amake school theke daka hoy, tobe ami mone kori na je ami satti hoi hasash baa onno kichur moto, eti keboli protidiner jinis.

Koyekta sokal ache jetaay ami ghumi, kintu eta satti bhlo lage je ami akhono ekrkom peye jai ami amar pochonder sob kichu kore feli, ami jani ei muhurte eta ekta kothin somoy kintu amar mone hoy na eta hote choleche chirkal ashaheen. Ashakori.
Tai kichu sangram kintu haa, thik ache. Apni ki kono somoy drag ba alcohol bhabat koren?
Na, mane amar ma pan korten kintu ami etike krach hisabe bhabat korar satti sotyo conscious hoiya cheshta korechi.
Tai bari te madyopan nei?
Kono madyopan nei ebong ami oboshoyi bachchader jonno bari te drag chai na. Sutotarang kono tini.
Sam ebong apnar chhoto bachchar shiter kote ba khabar ba ei dhoroner jinisgulir khetre ja proyojon ta nishchit korte ki?
Ami jatotao chesta korchi, jemon, amra akhono shiter kote kenar suyog paini. Goto borsho theke tar akhono eti dhroner eti mohon na kintu eti akhono jono shomadhan.
Tai tini gato borsho theke tar kote porechen. Haa. Apni ekta dhara ache je kothin karon arthik onno karon ache.

Beshi boro kore ami bolte chacchi je mudi kenakata korte ba jama-kapor kenakata kora uchit protyekke darjar baire niye jete chai. Eta ekta boro agniporikha. Thik? Mane, ami jani. Ei boroi ashoreo se take school-e ferot cheyeche tar sobkichui amra nite parini. Koyek otihrer modhye koyekti otihr dolar jog kora shohoj hobe.
Thik. Tai Sam-er kache somoy somoy shei jinishguli thake na ja tar akhono proyojon.
Ami thik onuman kori na. Na.
Haa. Ebong apni ki khabar janen ba apni freezer-e khabar pryapto? Apni ki oboshoyi khabar dite parben?

Ami bolte chacchi, amra bulk khabar sadashy pochhondor chhilo. Tai jokhon amra ber hoi tobe ami Sam-ke sei torit korte pochhondh kori, apni janen, sandwich, cereal-er jonno macaroni stuff. Ei bhabe, apni janen je tini kono somoy kono somoy nashta torat koren. School ba dinner-er age,

Jemon ami bolechilam, she maakaroni korbe. Aapni janen, kokhono kokhono eti durdanto noy, tobe ami pholti pachondo korbo ba, aapni janen, kokhono kokhono kichu snack food, kokhono kokhono aro bishesh khabar, ami anuman kori.
Ami chhilam aapni ki bolben tini koren? She ki ranna korche? Naki ranna korchen naki dutoi?
Ami anuman kori je uhhoyer ektoi mishron. Satyo bolte, jemon,
Tai bariro shomosto chaper sathe, emon kono somoy ki ghoteche je lokera syamer sathe sotti bhirto hoyeche ba tader chitkar koreche ba take kharap ba khatikor kotha boleche?
Sotti na. Ami bolte chai techtate,
Ebong apanar bari te tar shrongkhola kivabe porichalito hoyeche se sompore ki? Keu ki kokhono syamke aghat koreche ba aghat koreche ba sharirikbhabhe aghat koreche?
Na, kokhono na. Mane oke chhoto belaye timeout ditam, kintu
Joun nirjaton sompore ki? Keu ki syamke joun upaye ba anupayukto upaye sporsho koreche? Maf korben? Hyan, eti onek loker jonno shunte eti ektti kothin prashno. Kintu ami sobaike prashno korechilam,
Tai na, na, kokhono na. Ami amar shontaner sathe eti kokhono hote debona. Thik ache.

Tai, tai se joun nirjaton ba joun upayukto sporsho theke nirapod. Thik ache. Tai apni ki bhabe mone koren je syam tar ghonishtho paribarik somporker khetre ki korechen apni ki mone koren syamer anubhuti bhalobasa ebong somarthon kore.

Ami bolte chachchi, ami jani ami anuman kori je ami tar jonno toto ashapash chhilam na joto ami spashthoi hote chai, ami tader janate jatshonsho chesta kori je amra tar jonno koto jotonoshil. Majhe majhe amader kache ekta beshi taka thake, ami take bhalo kichu pete pari ja se chay. Aapni janen, ami take ekdhoroner kotha shunechi, se ekdhoroner chintabhabe koreche je oh, aapni amake jatota bhalobasen tar thekeo beshi aapni shishutike bhalobasen. Kintu eta spashtoi sotyo noy. Ami amar bacha dutoketa bhalobasi.
Tai tini ekhane thakle tini ki bolben bole aapni mone koren? Ebong ami take jiggasha korechi je se bhalobase kina.
Ami asha kori tini hyan bolben.
Kichu sondheho ase?
Mane, ami jemon bolechilam, ami jemon achi
Aapni ullekh korechen je apanar mayer sathe kichu kichu somosya chhilo.

Emon kono somoy hoyeche je apanar ma bari te sharirikbhave akramanatmak hoye uthechen?

Ebong apnar sathe tar somporker ki hobe? Tini kibhabe porichalona korchen ba apni kibhabe tar sathe bari te porichalona korchen?
Kichu din oboshoi onnodero cheye bhalo. Tini pochondo koren, amar dharonay apni bolte paren je ami tar achoron porikha korar chesta korechi jokhon se kichhuta peye jachchilo.
Ar kono ki tomar duijoner moddhe sharirik hatahati hoyeche?

Ebong apni jokhon juktir bolte chan tokhon sei juktiguli koto ta tivr hoy?
Jemon amra amader konthoswor barai, mane, ami ekhane jathashothyo chesta korchi.

Ebong, je, je tivrata, eta ki torko korar moto naki chitkar, chitkar ebong darja dhakka marar moto ba manush jinish chhudre marar moto?
Ami onuman kori apni bolte paren je amra besh jore peyechi. Ami bolte chachchi, se jabe ebong tar roome kichu slam korbe. Apni janen, ami, ami sputotai take kono bachchader aghat korte debona.
Ebong ei ghotona ghotche jokhon Sam ebong shishu kothay?

Sam shadharonot ei ghoray giye lukie thakbe, hoyto ei music ti chalu korbe. Apni janen, Li majhe majhe playpen er khachay ghumachchen, ami shompurno sot hote onumon kori, ami amar dhirgho harie feli ebong amar cheye beshi chitkar kori kintu
Tai mone hochhe ei somporker moddhe onek tanapodeen ebong, ebong, ebong torko hochhe. Apni koto ghon ghon bolben je eti ghote je eti ei dhroner torko ebong chitkarer jaygaye ashe?
Ami saptah e koyekbar moto onuman kori.
Ek dhoroner sesho proshno korte paren je apnar poribarer keu karagare ba karagare ache ki?

Thik ache. Tai je sob share korar jonno apnake onek dhonnobad. Ami shudhu songkolon jachchi. Mone hochhe ghotokal bochhor dhore onek chap ebong onek poriborton hoyeche. Hyan. Sam status dure sare geche, ja arthik khetre kichu poriborton er srishti koreche, ja hote pare, sob somoy apnar proyoniyo khawar ba poshak ba samera proyono chhilo na. Apni peyechen, apnar ma chole ashchen, ebong sekhane kichu chap ebong uttejona ebong torko hochhe je eti ghoteche. Ebong apni amake eo bolechen je ei somosto chap ebong jinishgulo Samke bhalobashar moto ba jatno neowar moto anubhav korteche. Apni amake bolechen je sharirik, manoshik ba jouno nirjatoner bishoye kono udbeg nei. Sam ebong tar jiboner jonno, ebong apnar poribare Samer jibone ar keu karagare jayni. Tai ami mone kori apni shudhu bolchen school e Samer jonno jokhon ghotche ebong bari te ei somosto chap ebong poriborton er sathe se je osuvodh gulo shuru koreche tar moddhe sombhobot ekto somoy oboshor. Ebong sei somoye, ami kichu upaye somporker kotha bolbo jate ami ekshathe ekta porikalpona tairi korte ba sahayyo korte pari.
Bhalo shonachchhe. Dhonnobad. Thik ache.
